title: Championship Riven
body:
Recently my second account was taken from me, and it contained championship riven. Riot was unable to help me (no salt not why i'm here), but i'm still interested in having riven on my account. It was the only reason that i played on my secondary account anyways. Do any riot members have any information on the re-release on riven, or if possible a skin transfer from my old account that was stolen to my main account. Macho grande money was spent on it, and i dont wish for it all to go to waste.

If anybody has any information, it means a lot. Thanks!
